item.description:
Become a Certified Laughter Yoga Leader!!!

Becoming a leader is great for anyone who wants to:

TEACH LAUGHTER YOGA CLASSES OR
RUN A LAUGHTER CLUB

REDUCE STRESS IN THEIR LIFE

BE A PART OF THE
MAINE LAUGHTER YOGA TEAM

OR

LEARN HOW TO CREATE A PRACTICE OF LAUGHTER IN
YOUR OWN LIFE

October 16 & 17 9:00-4:00pm
Bath, ME
Intructor: Katie West, The Levity Coach
$295.00
(bring a friend 2 for $500.00)

Upon Completion of 2 day course, you receive a certification
as a Laughter Yoga Leader from the Kataria School of Laughter Yoga
TO REGISTER OR TO LEARN MORE: www.thelevityinstitute.com

EMAIL: Katie(at)thelevitycoach(dot)com
PHONE: 207 -239-8667
item.name: NEW DATE for Fall Training: OCT 16 & 17 Become a Certified Laughter Yoga Leader
